title: DOM Reconciliation for Sidebar
details:
v1.6.3.7-v3 introduced DOM reconciliation to prevent CSS animation flickering in the sidebar. Key patterns:

1. Track DOM elements by ID: `_itemElements`, `_groupElements`, `_groupsContainer`
2. Reconciliation functions: `_reconcileGroups()`, `_reconcileGroupItems()`
3. Animation classes: `.new-item` for entrance, `.removing` for exit
4. Use `ANIMATION_DURATION_MS` constant from render-helpers.js (350ms)
5. CSS animations only trigger on class add, not on DOM insertion
6. Action buttons use event delegation, so replacing children is safe

Entry point: `_renderUIImmediate()` â†’ `_reconcileGroups()` (not full rebuild)
